response.original_title: The Black Side of the River
response.overview: After losing her grandmother's generational home to gentrification, 16-year-old Harriet Washington plunges into an underwater realm to ask Mami Wata for a chance to reclaim it.
response.tagline: After losing her grandmother's generational home to gentrification, 16-year-old Harriet Washington plunges into an underwater realm to ask Mami Wata for a chance to reclaim it.
response.title: The Black Side of the River
